interface.name: AS_FS_SCT_viewCustomerContacts_customerProfile
interface.description: Displays the contacts of the customer on the customer portal

a:ruleInputTestConfigs.a:value: #"_a-0000e62c-7375-8000-9bec-011c48011c48_1775427"( customerId: 1, isActive: true(), excludeNestedCdts: true, /* Sort so that the SRQs that are expected to be completed last are first in the list, then we can easily index to the first position for the correct pending value in below rules */ sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"( field: "targetCompletionDate", ascending: false ) )
